typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['EXP_HR_PARQUET']) ~> ParquetSingleFile
ParquetSingleFile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	filePattern:'EXP_HR_PARQUET_[n]',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 25),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ParquetSplitted
